Isaac ChanLevel 8. WizardUpdated on 21 Feb 2019The entrace of Grab and GoJek has certainly made the business environment way more competitive. However, I am skeptical to say that Comfort Delgro (CD) is doomed to fail.The first point that I would make is that although it is in the transportation industry, its revenue streams include revenue from buses, bus maintenance, driving centres etc. It also has revenue streams flowing in internationally also.Secondly, a lot of restructuring with regards to the transportation industry has also happened over the past few years, and potentially in the future too. These developments will have quite an impact on how CD fares too.In fact, RHB Research has upgraded ComfortDelGro to “buy” recently (15th Feb). This is due to expected strong profit contribution from new acquisitions and continued  organic growth in the public transport business. There is also expected to be a lack of significant rise in competition so far from Grab and GoJek .0 comments0
